inferences.inference: Emerging interest in Multimodal Research - monitor for breakthrough results
Integration of vision and language models reaching maturity - production-ready systems likely within 6 months
Resource constraints driving innovation - expect deployment on edge devices and mobile
Strong convergence in Language Models - expect production adoption within 6-12 months
Strong convergence in Vision Systems - expect production adoption within 6-12 months
Strong convergence in Reasoning - expect production adoption within 6-12 months
Moving beyond pattern matching toward genuine reasoning - still 12-24 months from practical impact
Strong convergence in Benchmarks - expect production adoption within 6-12 months
